archimate:ImplementationEvent.name: 20.11.2023 - Reported status to Mikaela Kemppi
archimate:ImplementationEvent.documentation:
Owen Richardson reported the status to Mikaela Kemppi
The major points reported: - Faced challenges with meeting attendance, with four rejections in one day. - Quality team expressed major concerns about System Access area; repeated issues over several years without resolution noted. - Corrective actions in System Access area: responsibility assigned to Martin Carbol. - Identified significant work on tools and platforms; Sami to represent baseline on the team, with potential collaboration with Noora for tools and platforms issues. - Aimed to provide more concrete findings by 22.11.2023, sharing preliminary findings in the meantime due to impending deadlines.
